title: JD Vance puts up middle finger at GOP dinner
shortDescription: Vice President JD Vance put up the middle finger at a GOP dinner event in Ohio when telling a story about Washington, D.C. residents.

title: Trump and Hegseth downplay Iran damage report
shortDescription: President Donald Trump pushed back on reports indicating the U.S. attack on Iranâ€™s nuclear facilities was not as successful as originally claimed.

title: DOGE staffer with online moniker 'Big Balls' quits White House
shortDescription: DOGE staffer Edward Coristine, whose online nickname was 'Big Balls,' has quit his White House job following Elon Musk's acrimonious split with Trump.

title: Trump says US strike impaired Iran's nukes. What does Pentagon say?
shortDescription: A fragile ceasefire between Israel and Iran was still in place Wednesday as both sides claimed victory in the conflict.

title: Daily Briefing: What NYC means for Democrats
shortDescription: Zohran Mamdani pulls off NYC Democratic mayoral upset. Here is the news to know on Wednesday.

title: Coming soon: big Supreme Court decisions on Trump, porn, religion
shortDescription: The Supreme Court is deciding major cases about the ability to block Trump's policies, religious rights and keeping minors from accessing online porn.

title: Why can't Democrats rein in Trump's use of military in Iran?
shortDescription: Three legislative proposals aim to curb Trump's use of the military in Iran but Republican leaders expect to defeat the Democratic proposals.

title: Trump arrives in Europe for NATO summit
shortDescription: President Donald Trump arrived at the NATO summit in The Netherlands focused on defense spending and the delicate Iran-Israel ceasefire.

title: Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' is shrinking. What's been cut?
shortDescription: Gone are GOP-led efforts to curb environmental rules, attempts to restrict federal judges' powers and plans to bulk up immigration enforcement.

title: Trump lands in Europe with Israel-Iran ceasefire intact
shortDescription: With an Israel-Iran ceasefire holding after a shaky start, Trump plans to jet in and out of a NATO summit in The Hague.

title: National parks staffing faces crunch time amid Trump cuts
shortDescription: National parks, which have been under budget and understaffed for years, are facing a severe worker shortage that has been made worse by cuts by the Trump administration.
